title: Process a Vendor Invoice
description: An accounts payable clerk needs to process an invoice submitted by a vendor for services rendered.

tasks.description: Receive the invoice and match it to a purchase order in the system.
tasks.expected_outcome: The clerk successfully matches the invoice to the correct PO.

tasks.description: Verify that the services have been marked as received or completed by the requesting department.
tasks.expected_outcome: The clerk confirms receipt of services has been logged.

tasks.description: Approve the invoice and schedule it for payment in the next payment run.
tasks.expected_outcome: The clerk approves the invoice for payment.
